Question: Suetonius, writing about the same time as Plutarch, also says this person died from an asp bite.
Hints: This person arrived in great state, and so charmed Antony that he chose to spend the winter of 41 BC–40 BC with her in Alexandria.
At this point, Caesar abandoned his plans to annex Egypt, instead backing this person's claim to the throne.
This person was regarded as a great beauty, even in the ancient world.
